website_summaries.verdict: This protective canvas beekeeping suit has a few design issues, but we recommend it for general defense against stinging insects, not limited to beekeeping duties.
pros: Good protection against most stinging insects
cons: Aggressive bees can enter several openings in suit

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it will offer the protection I need
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the suit yet, but I am sure it will be better than what I had last year when I was weed eating and discovered a nest of meat eating bees. They came after me, and I took off running. Fortunately there was a building near by. But no more weed eating with out protection!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Great suit! Wish it had side pockets though.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this suit for a few months but so far so good. This size is a tad too big for me (I'm 5' 9" and about 135lbs) but it's not a big deal and I'd rather it be too baggy than too tight. The only thing I wish it had were side pockets. It has two breast pockets and one back pocket. One bonus thing though, lots of the other beekeepers really liked this color as opposed to the standard white suits and I agree. I like this more subdued color a lot better than the bright white.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Bee Keeping Suit Keeps me Protected
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I expected. Its heavy duty ,gives me the protection i need when I inspect my two bee hives. I bought the Medium I am 5" 4 inches 138 pounds its perfect length and its roomy i feel safe in it. I just started bee keeping this is my first Bee suit , I feel its perfect for job.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. But no gloves are footies. Just suit and head gear. A little small. Order next size up
customer_reviews.author: nike shoe

customer_reviews.title: VERY Cheap zippers.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was good. Nothing stung me through it while I was still using it. The zippers are complete crap though. I used it maybe ten times and one zipper around the veil broke. I used it a couple more times with duct tape over that side until I got a replacement. I do not recommend this suit unless you only need it a couple times. Update: The front zipper also failed after one year of use (about once a week at most). STAY AWAY from this unless you only need it once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: matthew sitzman

customer_reviews.title: Free from Bees
customer_reviews.text: Friends that I sent them to, both said the were great.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Worked foe Home Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we have a bee problem in our chimney. My father used it successfully without getting stung. I do not believe it would be suitable for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: jbrooks

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works great natural colored beekeeping suit
customer_reviews.text: 5-4 145 lb fits great with jeans on underneath and loose enough after washing. No stings dealing with african ladies. I like the fencing mask style better than my old brim veil; visibility is better for me. I like the cottony feel and natural color of this suit.
customer_reviews.author: bravesirRobin

customer_reviews.title: Rides a bit
customer_reviews.text: The color is as pictured. It's a beige and I was thinking it would be whiter, but all good. No pockets in the front but there is one back pocket. Seems pretty secure. I really like the veil which has plenty of room. Can't wait to try it out! The measurement from the shoulder to crotch is very short and the legs are very long. For my long torso, it rides a little and it makes it hard to get the screen on and off. It does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: shannon reiden

customer_reviews.title: Plastic zippers do not work. Metal zip grabs the ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic zippers do not work. Metal zip grabs the plastic, binds, skips, and separates. Zipper should be metal. I am shopping for a replacement and will not purchase one with plastic zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I acquire the suit 2 times, the first it came defective and the second it came without the hood.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Mendez

customer_reviews.title: but works great. I'm really glad I splurged and got it
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit awkward to get into, but works great. I'm really glad I splurged and got it. I just caught a swarm in my front yard, and was really glad I was wearing a full suit when I had to pick up a hive full of bees and carry to my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: jasonR

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for a young woman. I bought them for my friend's daughter. She is very happy with the suit. She hasn't tried it yet to see if it protects her from being stung. At this time, we are very happy with the purchase. I'll update my review after she has used the suit. But, the fit was just right and she is attending a beekeeper's class and it is what the instructor recommended. It was a good price and the quality seems good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made but really large . I am female and only 5'2
customer_reviews.author: M. Holditch

customer_reviews.title: Material is strong and very good protection. If you buy this suit hand wash ...
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke the second use. Material is strong and very good protection. If you buy this suit hand wash the veil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bee Suit
customer_reviews.text: Great bee suit. It fits a little larger as we got this so my wife and guests and both use it. My wife is 5'4" and it's baggy, which is expected. Overall great construction and will last a long time. You have to be careful as the hood can easily come in contact with your face and you can get stung unless you wear a hat underneath to create the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: this is one great affordable bee outfit! I bought this particular suit because it is washable and came out of the wash still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: This item is also a gift, did not open ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is also a gift, did not open. As soon as I got it was mail to Central America hopefully the receiver likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia M.

product_meta.title: New Professional Medium Cotton Full Body Beekeeping Bee Keeping Suit, with Veil Hood by Aspectek
product_meta.description:
★ENJOY BEEKEEPING WITH FULL PROTECTION & GREAT COMFORT! 

Aspectek Beekeeper will have full protection with bee suit, it is designed to keep its users safe for your bee sting.

★Product Description 

Size: Medium Size

• Collar to Ankle 65" (165cm)

• Collar to Crotch 36.6" (93cm)

• Chest 36"- 50.4" (92-128cm)

• Waist 36"- 50.4" (92-128cm)

• Leg 31.4" (80cm)

• Arm 26.7" (68cm)

★Feature 

•Aspectek Bee suit is used with a 100% Cotton.

•It has an elastic waist band to accommodate a greater range of body sizes

•Large size tool pockets are suitable for both right and left handed beekeepers

•Extra space offering extra protection for your neck
feature_bullets: ★Ventilated beekeeper jacket with self-supporting round veil,veil with fixable strap
★Medium-weight 100% cotton cloth provides outstanding protection against bee stings, while ultra-breathable 100% synthetic, ventilation panels keep you cool in hot weather conditions
★Tailored fit with an elastic waist and elastic wrists, plus thumb holds to keep everything comfortably in place
★Unisex design for men and women with removable veil for easy cleaning and storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars69 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
